posts.post_content:
Looking to acquire some T-216's of players I don't already have.  

Looking for commons and HOFers with any of the three backs: Kotton (Type 1, 2, and 3), MINO, and Virginia Extra.

Any condition, raw or graded.

Looking to buy only.  I don't have anything to trade.

If you have something for sale, email me with your price and a scan of what you have, and I'll let you know if I need the player.

Email: [url]crazylocomerk@yahoo.com[/url]


Thank you in advance.

Hey Eric
You have probably seen it but I listed my T216 Evers portrait in my store on [URL="http://www.grandslambids.com"]www.grandslambids.com[/URL]
 
take care
leon

Eric,

I know this is aways off, but the next B & L Auction(begins towards the end of Sept.) will have 3 different T216 Kotton backs and a very nice Mino. 

Scott

Thanks Leon.  Unfortunately I already have the Evers (Chicago variation).  I still need a Boston variation though.

Scott, thank you for the heads up.  I'll make note of it, and will be watching.
